description: This Python script loads a set of fun facts about Earth into a document-based knowledge base, then creates an agent to query this knowledge base asynchronously.

classes.name: Document
classes.description: Represents a document containing content, used here to hold the fun facts about Earth.

classes.name: DocumentKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base constructed from documents, supporting vector database integration.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base to answer questions.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Asynchronous main function that loads the knowledge base, creates an agent, and queries it.
